B

BpiColorModel - class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiColorModel.
Represents a BPI color model.
BpiDecoder - class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder.
Decodes images stored in a DataInputStream in BPI format.
BpiDecoder(DataInputStream) - Constructor for class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder
Creates a new instance of BpiDecoder
BpiRaster - class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiRaster.
Represents a BPI raster consisting of the image size and raw pixel data.

C

createImage(BpiRaster) - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder
Creates an Image from the current color model and the provided raster.
createImage(BpiRaster, Graphics, int, int, int) - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder
Decodes an image from the current color model and the provided raster and renders it directly to the provided Graphics.

G

Returns the number of colors in the palette.

Returns the raw value of a pixel.

Returns the size of a pixel in bits.
getPixelSize() - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiRaster
Returns the size of a pixel in bits.
getWidth() - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiRaster

I

isIndexed() - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiColorModel

R

Reads a BPI color model from the underlying stream.
readImage() - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder

readImage(Graphics, int, int, int) - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder

readRaster() - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder
Reads a raster (image size and pixel data) from the underlying stream and returns it as a BpiRaster.
replacePixel(int, int) - Method in class net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiRaster
Replaces the raw value of pixels by a new one for each pixel of the raster.
